content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate. What's your offer? Remember, I'm looking to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe the market rate for a newly built unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center is quite competitive. However, I'm a student and I'm looking for the best deal possible. I'm willing to pay 700 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a pittance! I can barely cover the mortgage with that. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property. Let's try again, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for a fair price, Mister Schmidt. How about 750 Euros? It's a reasonable offer, considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 750 Euros? That's just a little better than a joke! This is a prime location, right in the heart of the city. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property. Let's try again, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm a student, and I'm trying to be reasonable. How about 800 Euros? It's a good compromise between your expectations and my budget.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 800 Euros? That's a little better, but it's still not what I'm looking for. This is a prime location, right in the heart of the city. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property. Let's try again, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I'm not going to be able to meet your expectations. I'm a student with a limited budget, and 800 Euros is the highest I can afford. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm not willing to exceed my budget. If you're not willing to accept 800 Euros, I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Mr. Wang, but I'm also not willing to accept such a low price for my property. I don't want to continue the negotiation because the price you're offering is far below my expectations. If you're not willing to pay more, we won't be able to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. It seems we have reached an impasse. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
